requirements.summary: Change the unauthenticated top-nav auth button label from "Login" to "Admin Login" while keeping "Logout" and "Logging in..." unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When not authenticated, the button rendered by frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton.tsx displays "Admin Login" (or "Admin Only") instead of "Login".
When authenticated, the button still displays "Logout".
While the login action is in progress, the button still displays "Logging in...".
No backend/Candid changes are made for this text-only change.

file_operations.description: Update the unauthenticated render branch text label from "Login" to "Admin Login", leaving the authenticated ("Logout") and in-progress ("Logging in...") labels unchanged. Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
